Scenario.title: Scenario
Scenario.description: Represents a game scenario with its metadata and content for the Deadlock Defender app.

id.description: Unique identifier for the scenario. This will be the document ID.

title.description: The title of the scenario, e.g., 'The Printer Queue Jam'.

description.description: A detailed description of the scenario's context and setup.

tags.description: An array of tags for categorizing the scenario (e.g., difficulty, topic).

imageUrl.description: URL of the scenario's thumbnail image.

content.description: Object containing the scenario setup, resource matrix, processes, and instructions.

/scenarios/{scenarioId}.description: Stores individual game scenario data. Scenarios are globally accessible for all authenticated users.
